abstract: HSBC shares fell in Asia and in Europe, as short-sellers dumped the stock in anticipation of buying it back after the bank completed its $17.7 billion rights issue, brokers said Monday.
lead_paragraph: HSBC shares fell in Asia and in Europe, as short-sellers dumped the stock in anticipation of buying it back after the bank completed its $17.7 billion rights issue, brokers said Monday.

headline.main: HSBC Falls 24% in Hong Kong on Short-Selling
